title: coin-score.ai
author: coin-score.ai
content: We analyzed the coins RNDR and KAS and identified the accumulation prices. Accumulation prices for Render Token are $1.31 and $0.92.Accumulation prices for Kaspa are pegged at $0.02 and $0.014.Have you started accumulating Kaspa and Render Token?https://coin-score.ai/articles/accumulation-prices-for-render-token-and-kaspa/

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I read the article and did not understand how accumulation prices were calculated. Is it a study of average past prices, including predicting the appropriate price to buy? If so, then it is more like a study of 200-day moving averages, but it is not a confirmation of the upward line, especially with a currency that has a low market capacity.Leveraging idle GPUs are not a revolutionary idea or they may push the price of the Render Token higher.Kaspa claims to be something revolutionary, namely simultaneous blocks, but I have often heard this word without finding a project that implemented it well.
